name: raspdac_mini_lcd
description: Hardware configuration & display drivers for Audiophonics RaspDacMini LCD
author: Olivier Schwach, Just a Nerd

volumio_info.details: Display driver for Audiophonics RaspDacMini 2.4 inch LCD (ILI9341). Provides real-time playback information, album art, volume control, repeat/shuffle indicators, DAC input switching, and metadata display with configurable screen timeout.
volumio_info.changelog: 1.1.0: DAC control (I2S/SPDIF, filters), repeat/shuffle icons, debounced remote, mute feedback, Docker builds
